text: @WhiteHouse @PressSec Trump spent the day rage tweeting and promoting debunked conspiracy theories, while the COVID19 toll approached 6 figures. And took a giant shit on all the men and women in uniform who died for us. There, cleaned it up for you. You’re welcome
